com.communote.server.web.commons.view.velocity

Class VelocityTemplateManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.communote.server.web.commons.view.TemplateManager
      • com.communote.server.web.commons.view.velocity.VelocityTemplateManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.springframework.beans.factory.Aware, org.springframework.web.context.ServletContextAware

    public class VelocityTemplateManager
extends TemplateManager
implements org.springframework.web.context.ServletContextAware
    Template manager optimized for velocity templates.
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/

    • Method Detail

      • addApplicationScopeTools

        public void addApplicationScopeTools(String providerId,
                                     Class<?>... toolClass)
        Add the provided velocity tools to the application scope toolbox.
        Parameters:
        providerId - the ID of the provider of the tools. This is usually the ID of a plugin.
        toolClass - the tools to add

        public void addRequestScopeTools(String providerId,
                                 Class<?>... toolClass)
        Add the provided velocity tools to the request scope toolbox.
        Parameters:
        providerId - the ID of the provider of the tools. This is usually the ID of a plugin.
        toolClass - the tools to add

      • addTemplateBasePath

        public void addTemplateBasePath(String basePath)
        Add a base directory for searching templates which are registered with a relative path.
        Parameters:
        basePath - absolute path to a directory for searching for templates

      • addTools

        public void addTools(String providerId,
                     Collection<Class<?>> applicationTools,
                     Collection<Class<?>> requestTools)
        Add the provided velocity tools to the application and request scope toolboxes. This method is more efficient if tools should be added to both toolboxes than calling the specific add-methods individually.
        Parameters:
        providerId - the ID of the provider of the tools. This is usually the ID of a plugin.
        applicationTools - the application scope tools to add
        requestTools - the request scope tools to add

      • getToolManager

        public org.apache.velocity.tools.view.ViewToolManager getToolManager()

      • removeTools

        public void removeTools(String providerId)
        Remove all tools that were added by the given provider.
        Parameters:
        providerId - the ID of the provider whose tools should be removed. This is usually the ID of a plugin.

        public void setServletContext(javax.servlet.ServletContext servletContext)
